guidetextdraw_123417._value: In this section provide a brief overview of the initiative, a summary of key elements of your existing FDI strategy. and how it aligns with the priorities of this program.
guidetextdraw_123417.name: textdraw_12341705201601038096111

guidetextbox_copy.jcr:title: Overview (Mandatory)
guidetextbox_copy.longDescription: Provide a brief description of the key objectives of your proposed initiative (e.g. improve community/regional capacity to attract FDI,increase foreign investor awareness of potential FDI opportunities in Canada, etc.). (100 characters minimum and 3,500 characters maximum)
guidetextbox_copy.name: gac_fdistrategyoverview

guidetextbox.jcr:title: Background (Mandatory)
guidetextbox.longDescription: Provide a summary of the key elements of your community/region’s existing FDI Strategy. For communities/regions developing a strategy, identify the key steps that will be used to develop an FDI strategy (e.g. developing an analysis of strengths and weaknesses, identifying target markets/sectors, etc.). Be sure to include an explanation of how the key objectives of your proposed initiative (described in 1.1) relate to your community/region’s FDI strategy, or how they relate to designing an FDI strategy. (100 characters minimum and 3,500 characters maximum)
guidetextbox.name: gac_fdistrategybackground

guidetextbox_1195121350.jcr:title: Alignment (Mandatory)
guidetextbox_1195121350.longDescription: How is this project consistent with Global Affairs Canada's FDI Priority sectors and markets? (100 characters minimum and 3,500 characters maximum)
guidetextbox_1195121350.name: gac_departmentalalignment

guidetextdraw._value: In this section provide a detailed breakdown of what activities you would be doing as a part of this project to attract FDI.
guidetextdraw.name: textdraw1599670290009

afformtitle_copy_cop.jcr:title: Adaptive Form Title
afformtitle_copy_cop._value: Tell us about your expected outcomes from this project.
afformtitle_copy_cop.name: formTitle

guidetextdraw._value: Specific obligations for reporting results are defined in the department contribution agreements. Recipients of program funding are expected to report actual results achieved by the end of the period of funding, and again through a survey approximately three years later. Actual results will be compared to the expected outcomes defined below.
guidetextdraw.name: textdraw1592852142125

guidetextbox_1457040832.jcr:title: How will this project contribute to improving your capacity to attract, retain and expand FDI for the benefit of your community/region? (100 - 2,000 character limit) (Mandatory)
guidetextbox_1457040832.name: expectedImmediateOutcomesContribute

guidetextbox_1394902507.jcr:title: How will this project increase potential foreign investors' awareness of FDI opportunities in Canada? (100 - 2,000 character limit) (Mandatory)
guidetextbox_1394902507.name: expectedImmediateOutcomesIncreaseAwarness

guidetextbox.jcr:title: How will this project enhance your community/region's knowledge of FDI opportunities? (100 - 2,000 character limit) (Mandatory)
guidetextbox.name: expectedImmediateOutcomesEnhanceCommunity

guidetextdraw.name: textdraw1600195167203

guidetextdraw_614408655._value: * Lead is a foreign company has the desire and capability to expand through investment abroad.
guidetextdraw_614408655.name: textdraw_6144086551600195204100

guidetextdraw_522463443.name: textdraw_5224634431600195383922

guidetextbox_680628717.jcr:title: Explain how this project will increase awareness of opportunities for retention and expansion of foreign companies in your community/region. If not applicable, please explain why. (100 - 2,000 character limit) (Mandatory)
guidetextbox_680628717.name: performanceMeasuresImprovingServices

guidetextbox_2020008525.jcr:title: Explain how this project will contribute to improving services (e.g. aftercare, follow-up, etc.) to foreign investors in your community/region? If not applicable, please explain why. (100 - 2,000 character limit) (Mandatory)
guidetextbox_2020008525.name: performanceMeasuresRetentionAndExpansion

guidetextbox.jcr:title: Explain any actions taken towards expanding your community/region’s strategic partnerships (e.g. with other unicipalities, regional partners or provincial/territorial government) for attracting FDI and how these contribute to this initiative, if applicable. (100 characters minimum and 3,500 characters maximum) (Mandatory)
guidetextbox.name: strategicPartnershipsDesc

guidetextdraw_486820573._value:
List your financial partners for this initiative (e.g. private sector, federal, provincial/territorial, municipal and other). For each, indicate a contact name, the expected contribution amount, and whether or not the funding is confirmed as of the date of your application.

If financial partnerships are not applicable for this proposal, please complete the section below by adding “N/A” to the fields for Partner and Contact, use “0” for the Contribution to Initiative field, and select either “yes” or “no” from the drop down menu.
guidetextdraw_486820573.name: textdraw_4868205731603326347791
